Time Period During Which a Rehabilitation Program Must Be Completed
Generally, Veterans must complete a VR&E program withinÂ 12 years from the date
they separate from military service, or
VA notifies them that they have a compensable, service-connected (SC) disability.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
